page.title: 06STOURBRIDGE COMMUNICATIONS
page.content: Stourbridge has three main methods of {communication};the postal service,newspapers and the telephone. All of which help to bind the community together and link it to the rest of the country. Stourbridge{Post Office},in the year of this project,is 100 years old as it was opened on December 21st. 1885.It now employs 134 people,working an average of 43 hours a week for a basic pay of Â£110.Each walking 12 mls.a day! As well as national newspapers, Stourbridge has several local papers, one of which is the very popular {Stourbridge News}.It is delivered free to 42000 homes within the area.The paper is financed through advertising, but the stories printed are of interest and importance to the Stourbridge area.
